name: Treasure Island
overview: Treasure Island, by Winham Classics, is a graphical adventure game based on the novel of the same name by Robert Louis Stevenson. The computer game was released in 1985. One notable feature of the Windham Classics series of adventure games was its family friendliness in that the presentation was colorfull and the puzzlies were approachable (as opposed to titles such as Demon Forge or King's Quest)
